title: Is We Dumb? | Ice Burn. Car Wash. Karaoke. Fishing Hole.
description:
Let's imagine for a second that you're masturbating... in front of a live studio audience... and they start booing you. Could you still finish? Let's talk about that, Joe absolutely shredding his back snowboarding, maybe the best karaoke YouTube channel of all time, a bored security guard doing one of the stupidest things ever, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

Wet Hot Bad Magic Summer Camp ticket sales will go live on March 15th at 12 noon Pacific time! Woohoo!! You can purchase your tickets at badmagicmerch.com, look for the banner at the top of the page! Camp is August 19-21, for VIPS and 20-21 for GA. It’s gonna be so much fun with camp activities like swimming, paddle boarding, arts and crafts and adult games like a giant beer pong, speed friending, endless amounts of drinking and overall adult fun! There will be a live Is We Dumb where shit is going to get super wild. And there will also be a Live Scared to Death… because summer camp is not complete without some scary ass stories! The entire Bad Magic crew will be there, so don’t miss your chance to hang out with us!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/5sMTyGwsV3M

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com

 

Merch:http://badmagicmerch.com

IG:https://instagram.com/iswedumb

 

FB:https://facebook.com/iswedumb

BadMagic YouTube:http://youtube.com/badmagicproductions

 

Official Website:http://iswedumb.com

Threads:http://badmagicmerch.com

 

Custom Music Beds by Zach Cohen

 

Fan Mail:

Is We Dumb?

PO Box 3891

Coeur d'Alene, ID 83816
author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
